transcripts.text: Hey everyone, this is Elijah Johnson with financeandliberty.com.  And yeah, I'm back.  A lot of you may be wondering, you know, what's been going on with my channel.  So yeah, about a year ago, I decided to become a missionary with the Fellowship of Catholic University Students.  Now, we focus our mission by imitating Christ, kind of focusing on a few people and helping them grow deeper in their faith and closer in relationship with God and then send them forth to do likewise.  And we focus that on college campuses.  And essentially I was trying to do both at the same time.  So I was allowed to keep my YouTube channel for a while as a hobby, right?  But I really felt torn between mission and the YouTube channel.  And I really felt the calling to do something more and to really put myself entirely into mission.  So ever since about March, April timeframe, I've been doing 100% mission on college campuses.  So that has been super transformative for me.  It's been really a journey to figure out, you know, what does it mean to put Christ at the center of your life?  Yeah, and it's I think been the best decision I've made in my life to become a missionary and really start spreading the gospel and really centering myself around Christ.  so yeah i've decided to put my all my efforts into missionary work but i understand there are tens of thousands of subscribers on this channel who are looking for information with regard to what is happening in the financial world.  so information on finance and also information on liberty.  so you know that's the reason i started my channel finance and liberty to give you guys information on this.  so one of our longtime sponsors Dunagan Kaiser from ReluctantPreppers.com is actually going to be taking over this channel and giving you guys the same sort of information.
